item.title: Lots of Litter oveflowing the litter bin on the street, 26th December
item.description:
This is a constant issue. The litter bins in Nazareth gardens of the stated address are never closed and people just keep dumping trash even bins are all full. All food and life wastes are all on the street. Holdron street nearby constantly suffers from the trash and smell brought by the wind blowing the trash fell out of the bins. This has cause a mouse issue and ugly depressing neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nazareth Gardens, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over pavements and broken debris on road, 26th December
item.description:
Litter all down Barry road and under hill road. Needs sweeping asap. There is an abandoned trolley outside number 63 Barry Road blocking pavement. Debris on road opposite under hill road bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Barry Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Lime Bime, 26th December
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous cycling on Riverside walk, 26th December
item.description:
A lot of bicycle riders are not respecting the no bikes signs on the Riverside walk. As a result several times I have witnessed a dangerous riding that almost hit children. I'd have noticed that the Riverside walk is not added to the restricted zones in apps for bicycle share like Lime, Santander, etc. Because of that I'd like to update the Lambeth restricted zones to include this area as a no go zone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathwall Quay, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old dirty mattress outside 57 Bethel Road, 26th December
item.description:
Dirty mattress on pavement blocking route for pedestrians There was a skip previously with rubbish and the mattress was on there but the skip is now gone and the mattress remains, so I believe it was fly tipped and probably didnâ€™t belong to the person who paid for the skip The mattress has been there for nearly a week now.
